page.title: 12Hotels and accommodation
page.content: Scarborough has numerous hotels all varying in size. Some are small with ten bedrooms, while large hotels have up to fifty or more.{Prices}vary from {Â£9.50}for bed, breakfast and evening dinner at a small hotel to{Â£22.50}a night at a large hotel just bed and breakfast. Evening meals at larger establishments are often{a la carte} while smaller hotels only serve{set {menus. The{Palm Court}is one of our large hotels having sixty bedrooms with shower, bath, telephone and colour television. There is an indoor swimming pool, table tennis facilities and a summer programme of entertainment for visitors. The largest hotel in Scarborough is the {Grand Hotel}and it is now owned by Butlins. All of the larger hotels are open all the year round.
